About this site

This site is super exploratory and very much a work in progress! I'm hoping it becomes a place to share modular, practical, and well-designed approaches to teaching research and writing skills. The focus is on research & writing at UCLA, but many of these tips will be useful for anyone taking on a research project.

Hope you find the site useful!

Development notes

This site is built in Jekyll hosted on github and built on the excellent foundation provided by the Long Haul jekyll theme.

Want to collaborate? Me too!

A collection of tips and strategies to help you get started on your research projects.
